Now where I’m a real sucker is project structure and where to start.. I constantly keep doubting should I do it this way or that way so any insights are welcome. I want to start from a good base to continue learning and provide great code and fluently working apps.

After watching your video I had the idea of per module a folder with the Model (C# class), WebApi Controller, AngularController, Views(they will be more than one page.. think overview , add, edit). My first concern is.. is this a good base or does it sound overkill .. since all I read or hear is SPA.. you must know I hardly know anything about AngularJS.

This is mainly a project to learn but I really want my code to be top notch. I’m already reading books about the SOLID principle and clean code but I want to improve on every level.

I know this message is rather big and thank you so much for taking the time to read it! As stated before any insights are much welcomed and I hope you have a pleasant day. Listening and watching to your seminars are truly helpful!

Thanks in advance
